description: Creates a backup gateway. After you create a gateway, you can associate it with a server using the AssociateGatewayToServer operation.

parameters.name: ActivationKey
parameters.description: The activation key of the created gateway.

parameters.name: GatewayDisplayName
parameters.description: The display name of the created gateway.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of up to 50 tags to assign to the gateway. Each tag is a key-value pair. (dict) --- A key-value pair you can use to manage, filter, and search for your resources. Allowed characters include UTF-8 letters, numbers, spaces, and the following characters: + - = . _ : /. The key part of a tag's key-value pair. The key can't start with aws:. The value part of a tag's key-value pair.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key part of a tag's key-value pair. The key can't start with aws:.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value part of a tag's key-value pair.

nested_items.name: GatewayArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway you create.
